author: cnbc.com
title: Big Lots To Broadcast Fourth Quarter 2017 Conference Call
text:
COLUMBUS, Ohio, March 1, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Big Lots, Inc. (NYSE: BIG) will host a conference call live at 8:00 a.m. Eastern Time on Friday, March 9, 2018 to discuss fourth quarter fiscal 2017 results.
FOURTH QUARTER RESULTS
WHAT:
Big Lots, Inc. invites you to listen to the live audio webcast of its Fourth Quarter Conference Call
DATE:
Friday, March 9, 2018
TIME:
8:00 a.m. Eastern Time
WHERE:
Big Lots is hosting the live webcast through the Investor Relations section of its website at http://www.biglots.com/corporate/investors/ . To listen to the call, click Register Now on the Investor Relations page at least 10-15 minutes before the broadcast begins.
If you are unable to join the live webcast, an archive of the call will be available at http://www.biglots.com/corporate/investors/ in the Investor Relations section of our website after 12:00 noon Eastern Time and will remain available through midnight Friday, March 23, 2018. A replay of this call will be available beginning March 9 at 12:00 noon Eastern Time through March 23 by dialing 1.888.203.1112 (Toll Free USA/Canada) or 1.719.457.0820 (Toll International), and entering the Replay Passcode 1281773.
View original content with multimedia: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/big-lots-to-broadcast-fourth-quarter-2017-conference-call-300606969.html
SOURCE Big Lots, Inc.
